ComicInfo.Summary:
"TONIGHT'S THE NIGHT"
Not everyone gets out alive when cops, killers and innocent bystanders converge on a house of homicide in the Hollywood Hills. Schemes unfold, secrets explode and all hell breaks loose in episode seven of this fast, funny 100% cool hit series!
*************************
Checkmate looms in the Hollywood Hills as a King, a Queen, two Knights and a pawn square off for a deadly endgame...all thanks to a wannabe player who barely understands tiddlywinks! Find out who wins, who cheats and who meets their match in part #7 of the critically acclaimed smash hit from EZD Productions!
